Distribution. China ( Guangxi , Guizhou , Heilongjiang , Jilin , Shaanxi , Shanxi , Sichuan , Yunnan ); India , Korea , Nepal .

Remarks. The redescription of
C. tenuiventris sensu He (1996)
is different from the redescription of
C. tenuiventris (Gravenhorst, 1829)
by Riedel (2018) . The figures kindly supplied by Dr M. Riedel show that
C. tenuiventris sensu He (1996)
is the same species as
C. arjuna
.
